title: SOHO International Film Festival
preview: Celebrating cutting-edge digital technology while honoring traditional forms of storytelling, the SohoFilmFest is a place for people to experience full-length features, short films and documentaries from both amateurs and professionals. The festivals include screenings, panels, social events and other networking events.
seo_title: SOHO International Film Festival | WestHouse Hotel New York
